features: Collapsible heel allows shoe to be worn as a camp and belay slipper
Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber compound is durable and grippy
Lug design provides forefoot friction on smooth surfaces and ease of stride on flats
Square edge on heel improves agility and braking on descents
Gusseted tongue helps minimize debris collection
Highly durable EVA foam midsole absorbs shock while providing precision stability
TPU midfoot chassis cradles and protects the foot
Moulded toe cap and raised perimeter sidewalls provide protection
Integrated lacing system helps create a precise and comfortable fit
